memory dump before is :


MEMORY DUMP BEFORE EXECUTION (HEX)
0000010d 00000012 00000003 ffffff0a
00001500 00000004 00001600 00000004
00000006 00001600 00000005 00001500
00000004 fffffe01 0000030f 00001500
00000005 fffff211 0000010a 00000002
0000000e 0000000a 00000000


memory dump after is :


0000010d  00000012  00000003  ffffff0a  
00001500  00000004  00001600  00000004  
00000006  00001600  00000005  00001500  
00000004  fffffe01  0000030f  00001500  
00000005  fffff211  0000010a  00000002  
0000000e  00000002  0000001e  

//the sum that is being calculated is :
10+8+6+4+2  = 30

the last block of memory which was 00000000 is now 0000001e which is the hex for 30 in decimal

hence this program works
